mapper.select: select p.user_no, p.plan_no, pd.plan_start_date, pd.plan_end_date, p.plan_time, pd.plan_content, p.plan_title from plan p, plan_detail pd where p.plan_no = pd.plan_no And user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: insert into plan (user_no, plan_title, plan_time) values (#{userNo}, #{planTitle}, #{planTime});
insert into plan_detail (plan_no, plan_start_date, plan_end_date, plan_content) values (#{planNo}, #{planStartDate}, #{planEndDate}, #{planContent})
